## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand with a margin for error. Given a 1-day lead time, ordering 30,000 units will allow for a 5-day stock buffer even after the player's planned 30,000 units are factored in. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size aligns with the player's planned purchase, ensuring stock availability over the next 5 days with additional buffer. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | Approximately 1.5 days (based on current stock and forecasted sales). |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days + 3 days of safety buffer = 8 days. |
| Comments                          | The recommendation ensures sufficient stock availability while considering a margin of error in demand forecasting.  Additionally, it aligns with the player's planned purchase, minimizing adjustments while maximizing stock availability. |
